Description:
Model
Brand: Cooler Master
Series: Masterbox 600
Model: MB600-WGNN-S00


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: White
Case Material: Exterior: Steel, Plastic
Left Side Panel: Tempered Glass
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: ITX, Micro ATX, ATX (Supporting Back-connector Motherboard), E-ATX (*up to 12” x 10.9” / 30.5cm x 27.7cm motherboards, may impact cable management)
Dust Filters: Bottom / Top


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 2
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 2 (Max. 6)
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, 1 x Audio,


Cooling System
Fan Options: Top: 3x 120mm / 3x 140mm
Front: 3x 120mm / 2x 140mm
Rear: 1x 120mm

Pre-installed Fan(s):
Front: 3x 140 ARGB
Rear: 1x 120 ARGB
Radiator Options: Front: 120/140/240/280/360/420mm 
Rear: 120mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 360mm, 410mm (w/o front radiator)
Max CPU Cooler Height: 170 mm
Max PSU Length: 170mm, 210mm (w/o HDD Cage)
Dimensions: 465 x 230 x 465 mm
Weight: 7.9 kg


Additional Info
Features: The MasterBox 600 White is engineered to elevate performance standards across the PC building community, ensuring all users can access top-tier features and capabilities. With ample room for a 420mm radiator and a 410mm GPU, alongside back-connector motherboard support, it sets a new benchmark for modern ATX cases.
Package Content: Masterbox 600 
Tool Kit
Label: Chasis Cooler Master MasterBox 600 White
